notes: Dedicated influencer collaboration program page. Seeks luxury travel, lifestyle, romance, wellness creators with high-quality visuals. Apply via their influencer page.
Active influencer collaboration program. Requires 10K+ followers, 3% engagement. Deliverables: 1 collab reel, 4 daily stories, tagged posts. 3-bedroom private pool villa.
Dedicated influencer page. Invites creators to experience Bali in style. Contact to discuss collaboration terms. Great for luxe private villa content.
231K+ Instagram followers. Dedicated content creator collaboration form at themulia.com/collaboration-form-request. Requests must be submitted 2+ weeks in advance. Ranked #1 resort in Indonesia.
Villa and resort management group with multiple Bali properties. Also: marcom@inivie.com for marketing collabs. 119K+ Instagram followers. Supports KOL/influencer campaigns actively.
Iconic Bali design hotel and beach club. Part of PTT Family. Strong social-media identity. Press/communications email found. Also home to the famous Potato Head Beach Club.
84K+ Instagram followers. Dedicated press release page. Glamping tented camp concept in Bali jungle. One of the most Instagrammable resorts in Southeast Asia. Award-winning.
169K+ Instagram followers. Part of Hyatt. Clifftop eco-resort with dramatic ocean views. Press Room available at alilahotels.com/press-room. Alila email format: first.last@alilahotels.com.
Secluded seaside resort between ocean and Mount Agung. 18K Instagram followers. Coconut grove setting. Part of Alila/Hyatt portfolio.
Marketing Communications contact. Anantara public relations page lists regional PR contacts. Beachfront luxury resort. Part of Minor Hotels group.
Director of Marketing & Communications. Clifftop resort with infinity pool. Part of Minor Hotels/Anantara group.

722K+ Instagram followers (@nihi). Named World's Best Hotel by T+L two consecutive years. 'Edge of Wildness' brand. Also: info@nihi.com general. Press page: nihi.com/sumba/inspiration/press/. Located near Bali.

134K+ Instagram followers. Dedicated content creator application page at maldives.baglionihotels.com/content-creator-application. Italian luxury brand. All-inclusive. Highly active influencer program.
Dedicated influencer program at hurawalhi.com/influencers. Adults-only all-inclusive. Seeks engaged audiences with loyal following. Apply via online form. Phone: +960 6622000.
Director of Sales & Marketing is key contact. Dedicated media partnerships page. Receives large volume of blogger/influencer inquiries. Requires demonstrated media/marketing value. Overwater villas.

Press contact: Maggie Chng. Also: reservations.maldives@comohotels.com. Located on Makunufushi, South Male Atoll. Overwater bungalows inspired by traditional Maldivian dhoni boats. COMO Shambhala wellness.
233K+ Instagram followers. Dedicated press/PR page at finolhu.com/press. Describes itself as 'A tropical island playground.' Active press and influencer program. Part of Seaside Collection.
Also: pr@reethifaru.com for PR, sales@reethifaru.com for sales. Bio-luxury resort on Filaidhoo Island. 32K+ Instagram followers. Eco-friendly focus. Multiple dedicated contact emails.

242K+ Instagram followers. Art-immersive luxury resort. PR handled by Petrie PR. Phone: +960 658 44 44. Also JOALI BEING wellness retreat: info.being@joali.com. Known for hosting top influencers (e.g. Gypsea_lust).
Marketing email for the group. Also resa@constancehotels.com for reservations. Has worked with top travel influencers (SaltyLuxe, World's Leading Island Travel Influencer 2020). Overwater villas.
Communications Director is Mercy Guerva. Marketing & Comms Manager: Khaled Jarrah. Private island resort. Ultra-luxury. Contact page: waldorfastoriamaldives.com/contact. Phone: +960 4-000300.
Ultra-luxury private island resort. Strong social media presence. Part of Accor Luxury. Stunning overwater villa photography. Well-known among luxury travel influencers.
Dedicated influencer request form at katarocks.com/influencers. Press features page. Oceanfront luxury villas. Phone: +66 (0)76 370 777. Seeks engaged audiences that align with brand values.
Dedicated media & influencer request page at verandaresortphuket.com/media-influencer-request. Phone: +66 (0)76 338 999. Boutique beachfront resort.

11 boutique properties in Phuket & Krabi. Dedicated media/influencer request page. 11K Instagram followers. Each property has its own email (Art: info@sugarmarina-art.com, Nautical: info@sugarmarina-nautical.com).

brand_name: Novotel Marina Sriracha & Koh Si Chang
notes: Dedicated influencer/blogger collaboration page. Accor property. Good for content creators looking for Thai coastal content. Active marketing department email confirmed.
Also: reservations@kamalaya.com and info@kamalaya.com. PR dept hours: 8:30am-6:30pm. Award-winning wellness sanctuary and holistic spa. Strong fit for wellness/mindfulness influencers.
22K+ Instagram followers. Female-founded, proudly independent. 27 ultra-luxurious villas. Known for sustainability. Press page available. Stunning untouched island setting.
12K Instagram followers. Media centre at nikoi.com/media-centre. PR represented by Rupp PR for DACH markets. Eco-luxury private island. Also sister property Cempedak Island.

Award-winning barefoot luxury resort. Dedicated press page at naypaladhideaway.com/press. Executive Director: Vince Lampert. Phone: +63 9177017840. Frequently featured in international luxury travel media.
Multiple luxury properties across Sri Lanka. Uga Bay (@uga_bay on Instagram). Boutique eco-luxury. Contact also via ugaescapes.com. Good for Sri Lanka travel creators.

Global PR contacts at sixsenses.com/en/corporate/media-center/global-pr-contacts. HQ: Bangkok, Thailand. Well-known for sustainability and wellness. Active influencer program through editorial media reps.
Global PR contacts page available for media/influencer visits. Clifftop resort with dramatic Indian Ocean views. Wellness-focused. Part of IHG.

Aman group press: press@aman.com (global). PR in Asia via Petrie PR (aman@petriepr.com). Beach resort on Sri Lanka's south coast. 26 open-air suites overlooking the Indian Ocean. Turtles nesting beach.
